Visualization
============

``EZMotion`` is a high-level OO Python package which aims to provide an easy and intuitive way of interacting with nearby Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) devices (GATT servers). In essence, this package is an extension of the ``bluepy`` package created by Ian Harvey (see `here <https://github.com/IanHarvey/bluepy/>`_)


Kinematic
**********

To perform a kinematic analysis the following files are required.



Inverse Dynamic
***********

To perform a inverse dynamic analysis the following files are required.

Forward Dynamic
***********

To perform a forward dynamic analysis the following files are required.

Musculoskeletal
***********

To perform a inverse musculoskeletal dynamic analysis the following files are required.
